question.text: What advice should you give to a driver who has had a few alcoholic drinks at a party?

explanation.text: Drinking black coffee or waiting a few hours won’t make any difference. Alcohol takes time to leave the body. A driver who has been drinking should go home by public transport or taxi. They might even be unfit to drive the following morning.

answer.text: Have a strong cup of coffee and then drive home
Wait a short while and then drive home
